Html:
Hi,

Would it be possible to get a reference to the shell window from view?

We would like to put a check box on the view in a region of the shell view to toggle the full screen mode.

 

Thanks

Hi,

The recommended approach is to add a view with this checkbox in that particular region of your shell window using either View Discovery or View Injection. For more information on these two topic, you could take a look at the following sections on MSDN:

  • How to: Show a View in a Region Using View Discovery UI Composition
  • How to: Show a View in a Region Using View Injection UI Composition

I do not know your exact scenario, but if you consider necessary to reference your shell windows from a view, I would suggest you to share more details of your scenario that help to clarify this situation. This way, we could find a possible approach that fits with your scenario.

I hope this help.

Fernando Antivero
